about_the_game:
Dawn of Yokai is built for PC, Mobile and Tablet devices.
Purchase of this game include files for each respective device.

This single player RPG takes place in Japan and explores the Shinto belief in entities known as Yokai, traversing several different cities in Japan as the game progresses. A healthy mix of healing and damage is the most effective way to clear the game. There are many Easter Eggs hidden within this game. Can you find them all? You play as Oliver, a young warrior born pure of heart. He is on a quest to attend the annual festival with his friends.

**MAJOR UPDATE**
Adjustments to quality of life gameplay
Additional Story
Additional Items
Additional Bosses

Can you survive the chaos?

This game was built using RPG Maker MZ. It is my first game so please leave helpful comments and report any bug-like experiences.

short_description: This single player RPG takes place in Japan. Yokai are terrorizing the entire island. This game involves a level of strategy. A mix of healing and damage is most effective. This game was built using RPG Maker MZ. Please leave comments and report bugs.
